other_title: アンジェリーク　Twinコレクション
opening_theme: #1: "Gold Rush ~21st Century's~" by Olivie (cv. Takehito Koyasu) (ep 1)
#2: "Kimi no Tame ni Koko ni Iru" by Randy (cv. Nobutoshi Canna) (ep 2)

#6: "Kiss shite ii?" by Mel (cv. Yumi Touma) (ep 6)
#7: "Illusion ~Mabaroshi no Chou~" by SeiLan (cv. Tetsuya Iwanaga) (ep 7)
#8: "Together ~Michi Naki Michi o Susume~" by Victor (cv. Fumihiko Tachiki) (ep 8)
ending_theme: #2: "Hoshi no Yubiwa - Shining Star -" by Timka (cv. Atsushi Kisaichi) (ep 2)
#5: "Stay ~Asu Naki Sekai de" by Arios (cv. Ken Narita) (ep 5)
#6: "Shijou ni Te" by Luva (cv. Toshihiko Seki) (ep 6)
